data.Search: 1*Before Jehova's awfulthrone*Jhon Hatton*Before Jehovah's aweful throne ye nations bow with sacred joy know that the Lord is God alone he can create and he destroy*Before Jehovah's aweful throne ye nations bow with sacred joy know that the Lord is God alone he can create and he destroy*We'll crowd thy gates with thankful songs high as the heavens our voices raise and earth with her ten thousand tongues shall fill thy courts with sounding praise*Wide as the world is thy command vast as eternity thy love firm as a rock thy truth must stand when rolling years shall cease to move
data.Ayat1: Before Jehovah's aweful throne, ye nations, bow with sacred joy; know that the Lord is God alone: he can create, and he destroy.
data.Ayat2: His sovereign power, without our aid,made us of clay, and formed us then; and, when like wandering sheep we strayed, he brought us to his fold again.
data.Ayat3: We'll crowd thy gates with thankful songs, high as the heavens our voices raise; and earth, with her ten thousand tongues, shall fill thy courts with sounding praise.
data.Ayat4: Wide as the world is thy command, vast as eternity thy love; firm as a rock thy truth must stand, when rolling years shall cease to move.

data.Search: 2*Di hadapan hadirat Hu*Jhon Hatton*Di hadapan hadirat Hu Hai bangsa-bangsa tunduklah Ketahuilah olehmu Khalikmu itulah Allah *Dari debu dan tanahlah Kita dijadikan Tuhan Dan bila tersesat kita Tuhan tak akan tinggalkan*Kuasa dan kasih Allah Memenuhi segnap dunia Tetap teguhlah firman-Nya,Hingga penuh hadiratNya*Di pintu Surga yang suci Menyanyi beribu lidah Tuhan kita akan puji Sampai slama-lamanya.
data.Ayat1: Di hadapan hadirat Hu Hai bangsa-bangsa tunduklah Ketahuilah olehmu, Khalikmu itulah Allah.
data.Ayat2: Dari debu dan tanahlah Kita dijadikan Tuhan Dan bila tersesat kita, Tuhan tak akan tinggalkan.
data.Ayat3: Kuasa dan kasih Allah Memenuhi segnap dunia Tetap teguhlah firman-Nya,Hingga penuh hadirat-Nya.
data.Ayat4: Di pintu Surga yang suci Menyanyi beribu lidah Tuhan kita akan puji, Sampai slama-lamanya.

data.Search: 3*Praise God from whom all blsessing flow*Louis Borgeois*Praise God from whom all blessings flow Praise Him all creatures here below Praise Him above ye heav'nly host Praise Father Son and Holy Ghost Amen
data.Judul: Praise God from whom all blsessing flow
data.Ayat1: Praise God, from whom all blessings flow; Praise Him, all creatures here below; Praise Him above, ye heav'nly host; Praise Father, Son, and Holy Ghost. Amen.

data.Search: 4*The Lord is ini his holy temple*George F Root*The Lord is in His holy temple The Lord is in His holy temple Let all the earth keep silence Let all the earth keep silence before him keep silence keep silence before Him
data.Judul: The Lord is ini his holy temple
data.Ayat1: The Lord is in His holy temple, The Lord is in His holy temple, Let all the earth keep silence, Let all the earth keep silence before him, keep silence, keep silence before Him

data.Search: 5*Kepada Allah bri puji*Thomas Ken*Kepada Allah bri puji Yang brikan berkat dan kasih Smesta alam pujilah trus Bapa Anak dan Roh Kudus
data.Ayat1: Kepada Allah bri puji, Yang brikan berkat dan kasih, Smesta alam pujilah trus, Bapa, Anak dan Roh Kudus

data.Search: 6*Tuhan ada dalam kaabah*Richard S Willis*Tuhan ada dalam kaabah Ya kaabah kesucianNya Hai isi segnap dunia Berdiamlah di hadapan Allah Berdiam Berdiam Berdiam Amin
data.Ayat1: Tuhan ada dalam kaabah, Ya kaabah kesucian-Nya, Hai isi segnap dunia, Berdiamlah di hadapan Allah, Berdiam Berdiam Berdiam Amin

data.Search: 7*Tread Softly*William H Doane*Fanny J Crosby*Be silent be silent A whisper is heard Be silent and listen Oh treasure each word*Be silent be silent For holy this place This altar that echoes The message of grace*Be silent be silent Breathe humbly our prayer A foretaste of Eden This moment we share*Be silent be silent His mercy record Be silent be silent And wait on the Lord*Tread softly tread softly The Master is here Tread softly tread softly He bids us draw near
data.Pengubah: William H. Doane,  Fanny J. Crosby
data.Ayat1: Be silent, be silent, A whisper is heard, Be silent, and listen, Oh, treasure each word!
data.Ayat2: Be silent, be silent, For holy this place, This altar that echoes The message of grace.
data.Ayat3: Be silent, be silent, Breathe humbly our prayer, A foretaste of Eden This moment we share.
data.Ayat4: Be silent, be silent, His mercy record, Be silent, be silent And wait on the Lord
data.Ref: Tread softly, tread softly, The Master is here, Tread softly, tread softly, He bids us draw near.

data.Search: 8*Berdiam Berdiam*William H Doane Fanny J Crosby*Berdiam berdiam Bisik pun jangan Berdiam dan dengar Tuhan berfirman*Berdiam berdiam Karna sucilah Tenangkan langkahmu Dengar kabarNya*Berdiam berdiam Pintalah doaTempat ini Sperti Firdaus rasanya*Berdiam berdiam Trima berkat-Nya Berdiam dan tunggu Sembahlah Allah*Berjalan perlahan Tuhanmu hadir Berjalan perlahan Datanglah hampir
data.Pengubah: William H. Doane,  Fanny J. Crosby
data.Ayat1: Berdiam, berdiam, Bisik pun jangan; Berdiam dan dengar Tuhan berfirman.
data.Ayat2: Berdiam, berdiam, Karna sucilah Tenangkan langkahmu Dengar kabar-Nya
data.Ayat3: Berdiam, berdiam, Pintalah doa;Tempat ini Sperti Firdaus rasanya.
data.Ayat4: Berdiam, berdiam, Trima berkat-Nya; Berdiam, dan tunggu, Sembahlah Allah.
data.Ref: Berjalan perlahan, Tuhanmu hadir, Berjalan perlahan, Datanglah hampir.

data.Search: 9*Hear our prayer*George Whelpton*Hear our prayer O Lord hear our prayer O Lord incline thine ear to us and grant us thy peace Amen
data.Ayat1: Hear our prayer, O Lord, hear our prayer, O Lord; incline thine ear to us, and grant us thy peace. Amen.

data.Search: 10*The Lord be with us*James Walch*The Lord be with us as we bend His blessing to receive His gift of peace on us descend Before His courts we leave*The Lord be with us as we walk Along our homeward road In silent thought or friendly talk Our hearts be near to God*The Lord be with us till the night Shall close the day of rest Be He of every heart the Light Of every home the Guest*The Lord be with us through the hours Of slumber calm and deep Protect our homes renew our powers And guard His people's sleep
data.Ayat1: The Lord be with us as we bend, His blessing to receive; His gift of peace on us descend, Before His courts we leave.
data.Ayat2: The Lord be with us as we walk Along our homeward road; In silent thought or friendly talk Our hearts be near to God
data.Ayat3: The Lord be with us till the night Shall close the day of rest; Be He of every heart the Light, Of every home the Guest
data.Ayat4: The Lord be with us through the hours Of slumber, calm and deep; Protect our homes, renew our powers, And guard His people's sleep.

data.Search: 11*Dengar Ya Tuhan*George Whelpton*Dengar ya Tuhan Dengar ya Tuhan Akan doa kami dan bri damaiMu Amin
data.Ayat1: Dengar ya Tuhan, Dengar ya Tuhan, Akan doa kami dan bri damai-Mu. A-min

data.Search: 12*Ya Tuhan Iringlah Kami*J Ellerton*Ya Tuhan iringlah kami Bri damai dan tenang Curahkan berkat dan kasih Seblum kami pulang*Ya Tuhan iringlah kami Di jalan ke rumah Dalam keteduhan hati Satu dengan Allah*Ya Tuhan iringlah kami Sampai malam tiba Tetaplah Engkau menjadi Tamu setiap rumah
data.Ayat1: Ya Tuhan, iringlah kami, Bri damai dan tenang. Curahkan berkat dan kasih, Seblum kami pulang.
data.Ayat2: Ya Tuhan, iringlah kami, Di jalan ke rumah. Dalam keteduhan hati, Satu dengan Allah.
data.Ayat3: Ya Tuhan, iringlah kami, Sampai malam tiba. Tetaplah Engkau menjadi, Tamu setiap rumah.

data.Search: 13*Lord We Come Before Thee Now*William Hammond*Lord we come before Thee now At Thy feet we humbly bow O do not our suit disdain! Shall we seek Thee Lord in vain Shall we seek Thee Lord, in vain*Lord on Thee our souls depend In compassion now descend Fill our hearts with Thy rich grace Tune our lips to sing Thy praise Tune our lips to sing Thy praise*Send some message from Thy word That may joy and peace afford Let Thy Spirit now impart Full salvation to each heart Full salvation to each heart*Comfort those who weep and mourn Let the time of joy return Those that are cast down lift up Make them strong in faith and hope Make them strong in faith and hope*Grant that all may seek and find Thee a God supremely kind Heal the sick the captive free Make them strong in faith and hope Make them strong in faith and hope
data.Judul: Lord, We Come Before Thee Now
data.Ayat1: Lord, we come before Thee now, At Thy feet we humbly bow. O do not our suit disdain! Shall we seek Thee, Lord, in vain? Shall we seek Thee, Lord, in vain?
data.Ayat2: Lord, on Thee our souls depend. In compassion now descend, Fill our hearts with Thy rich grace, Tune our lips to sing Thy praise, Tune our lips to sing Thy praise.
data.Ayat3: Send some message from Thy word That may joy and peace afford. Let Thy Spirit now impart. Full salvation to each heart, Full salvation to each heart.
data.Ayat4: Comfort those who weep and mourn, Let the time of joy return. Those that are cast down lift up, Make them strong in faith and hope, Make them strong in faith and hope.
data.Ayat5: Grant that all may seek, and find Thee a God supremely kind. Heal the sick, the captive free. Make them strong in faith and hope, Make them strong in faith and hope.

data.Search: 14*Kami Datang PadaMu*William Hammond*Kami datang pada-Mu Menyembah di kaki-Mu Janganlah tolak kami Tuhanlah kami cari Tuhanlah kami cari*Kami harap pada-Mu Bri kasihan sepenuh Isikan hati kami Dengan rahmat dan puji Dengan rahmat dan puji*Brikan kami ya Tuhan Damai dan kesukaan Brikanlah oleh Roh-mu Keslamatan yang penuh Keslamatan yang penuh*Yang berduka hiburkan Brikanlah kesenangan Tang tlah jatuh angkatlah Teguhkanlah imannya Teguhkanlah imannya*Brikan pada yang cari Rahmat-Mu serta kasih Bebaskanlah tawanan Dan brikan kesukaan Dan brikan kesukaan
data.Ayat1: Kami datang pada-Mu, Menyembah di kaki-Mu. Janganlah tolak kami! Tuhanlah kami cari! Tuhanlah kami cari!
data.Ayat2: Kami harap pada-Mu, Bri kasihan sepenuh. Isikan hati kami, Dengan rahmat dan puji, Dengan rahmat dan puji.
data.Ayat3: Brikan kami, ya Tuhan, Damai dan kesukaan. Brikanlah oleh Roh-mu, Keslamatan yang penuh, Keslamatan yang penuh.
data.Ayat4: Yang berduka, hiburkan, Brikanlah kesenangan. Tang tlah jatuh, angkatlah, Teguhkanlah iman-nya, Teguhkanlah iman-nya
data.Ayat5: Brikan pada yang cari, Rahmat-Mu serta kasih. Bebaskanlah tawanan, Dan brikan kesukaan, Dan brikan kesukaan.

data.Search: 15*Fairest Lord Jesus*Gesangbuch Munster*Fairest Lord Jesus Ruler of all nature O Thou of God and man the Son Thee will I cherish Thee will I honor Thou art my glory joy and crown*Fair are the meadows Fairer still the woodlands Robed in the blooming garb of spring Jesus is fairer Jesus is purer Who makes the woeful heart to sing*Fair is the sunshine Fairer still the moonlight And all the twinkling starry host Jesus shines brighter Jesus shines purer Than all the angels heaven can boast
data.Ayat1: Fairest Lord Jesus, Ruler of all nature, O Thou of God and man the Son! Thee will I cherish, Thee will I honor, Thou art my glory, joy, and crown
data.Ayat2: Fair are the meadows, Fairer still the woodlands, Robed in the blooming garb of spring. Jesus is fairer, Jesus is purer, Who makes the woeful heart to sing.
data.Ayat3: Fair is the sunshine, Fairer still the moonlight, And all the twinkling, starry host. Jesus shines brighter, Jesus shines purer Than all the angels heaven can boast.

data.Search: 16*Yesus Terindah*Gesangbuch Munster*Yesus terindah Raja alam semesta Anak Allah dan manusia Engkau kusembah Engkau kucinta Engkaulah Raja yang mulia*Indahlah padang Indahlah pun hutan Dihiasi bunga bunga Terlebih indah kasihnya Yesus Yang menggembirakan jiwa*Indah trang bulan Matahari juga Indahlah bintang semua Terlebih indah cahaya Yesus Lebih dari malaikatNya*
data.Ayat1: Yesus terindah, Raja alam semesta. Anak Allah dan manusia Engkau kusembah. Engkau kucinta, Engkaulah Raja yang mulia.
data.Ayat2: Indahlah padang, Indahlah pun hutan, Dihiasi bunga bunga. Terlebih indah kasihnya Yesus Yang menggembirakan jiwa.
data.Ayat3: Indah trang bulan, Matahari juga Indahlah bintang semua. Terlebih indah cahaya Yesus, Lebih dari malaikat-Nya.

data.Search: 17*Holy Holy Holy*Reginald Heber*Holy holy holy Lord God Almighty Early in the morning our song shall rise to Thee Holy holy holy merciful and mighty God over all who rules eternity*Holy holy holy Angels adore Thee Casting down their bright crowns around the glassy sea Thousands and then thousands worship low before Thee Which wert and art and evermore shalt be*Holy holy holy Though darkness hide Thee Though the eye of man Thy great glory may not see Only Thou art holy There is none beside Thee Perfect in power in love and purity
data.Ayat1: Holy, holy, holy! Lord God Al-mighty! Early in the morning our song shall rise to Thee. Holy, holy, holy! merciful and mighty! God over all who rules eternity!
data.Ayat2: Holy, holy, holy! Angels adore Thee, Casting down their bright crowns around the glassy sea. Thousands, and then thousands worship low before Thee, Which wert, and art, and evermore shalt be.
data.Ayat3: Holy, holy, holy! Though darkness hide Thee, Though the eye of man Thy great glory may not see. Only Thou art holy. There is none beside Thee, Perfect in power, in love and purity.

data.Search: 18*Suci Suci Suci*Reginald Heber*Suci suci suci Yang Maha tinggi Kami nyanyi pujian siang dan malam Suci suci suci! Allah Maha kasih Yang memerintah semesta alam*Suci suci suci! Malaikat sembah Tersungkur di bawa kaki Allah Bapa Beribu berlaksa Bersembah sujudlah Engkau yang kekal slamalamanya*Suci suci suci Meskipun skarang Wajah-Mu ya Allah tak boleh dipandang Hanya Engkau saja Lain tiada lagi Yang Mahakuasa kasih dan suci*
data.Ayat1: Suci, suci, suci! Yang Maha tinggi, Kami nyanyi pujian siang dan malam. Suci, suci, suci! Allah Maha kasih, Yang memerintah semesta alam.
data.Ayat2: Suci, suci, suci! Malaikat sembah, Tersungkur di bawa kaki Allah Bapa. Beribu, berlaksa, Bersembah sujudlah, Engkau yang kekal slama-lamanya.
data.Ayat3: Suci, suci, suci! Meskipun skarang, Wajah-Mu, ya Allah, tak boleh dipandang. Hanya Engkau saja, Lain tiada lagi, Yang Mahakuasa, kasih dan suci.

data.Search: 19*Love Divine*Charles Wesley*Love divine all loves exceling Joy of heaven to earth come down Fix in us Thy humble dwelling All thy faithful mercies crown Jesus Thou art all compassion Pure unbounded love Thou art Visit us with Thy salvation Enter every trembling heart*Breathe O breathe Thy loving Spirit Into every troubled breast Let us all in Thee in her it Let us find the prorhised rest Take away our bent to sinning Alpha and Omega be End of faith as its beginning Set our hearts at liberty*Come Almighty to deliver Let us all Thy grace receive Suddenly return and never Never more Thy temples leave Thee we would be always blessing Serve Thee as Thy hosts above Pray and praise Thee without ceasing Glory in Thy perfect love*Finish then Thy new creation Pure and spotless let us be Let us see Thy great salvation Perfectly restored in Thee Changed from glory in to glory Till in heaven we take our place Till we cast our crowns before Thee Lost in wonder love and praise
data.Ayat1: Love divine, all loves exceling, Joy of heaven to earth come down. Fix in us Thy humble dwelling, All thy faithful mercies crown! Jesus, Thou art all compassion, Pure, unbounded love Thou art. Visit us with Thy salvation, Enter every trembling heart.
data.Ayat2: Breathe, O breathe Thy loving Spirit Into every troubled breast! Let us all in Thee in her it, Let us find the prorhised rest. Take away our bent to sinning. Alpha and Omega be. End of faith, as its beginning, Set our hearts at liberty.
data.Ayat3: Come, Almighty to deliver, Let us all Thy grace receive. Suddenly return, and never, Never more Thy temples leave. Thee we would be always blessing, Serve Thee as Thy hosts above, Pray and praise Thee without ceasing, Glory in Thy perfect love.
data.Ayat4: Finish, then, Thy new creation. Pure and spotless let us be. Let us see Thy great salvation Perfectly restored in Thee. Changed from glory in to glory, Till in heaven we take our place, Till we cast our crowns before Thee, Lost in wonder, love, and praise.

data.Search: 20*Kasih Surga yang Terindah*Charles Wesley*Kasih surga yang terindah Turunlah pada kami Dalam kami bertakhtalah Dan sucikanlah hati Yesus Engkau berkasihan KasihMu ta terduga Marilah dan berkrajaan Dalam hati yang bersrah*Hembuskanlah Rohul kudus Dalam hati yang duka Agar Almasih yang tulus Bri perdamaian jiwa Engkau Tuhan berkuasa Awal dan akhir iman Buangkan dosa dari jiwa Brikanlah kemenangan*Engkaulah yang berkuasa Melepaskan umatMu Curahkan rahmat berlimpah Kuduskanlah umatMu PadaMu kami berbakti Oleh kemurahanMu Kami pun tiada berhenti Memuliakan NamaMu*Jadikan kami baharu Sempurna dalam Yesus Slamatlah oleh kasihMu Dari mati dan dosa Kami klak tiba di surga Dalam negri yang mulia Kami klak trima mahkota Dan pandang muka Yesus
data.Ayat1: Kasih surga yang terindah, Turunlah pada kami. Dalam kami bertakhtalah, Dan sucikanlah hati. Yesus Engkau berkasihan, Kasih-Mu ta' terduga. Marilah dan berkrajaan, Dalam hati yang bersrah.
data.Ayat2: Hembuskanlah Rohul kudus, Dalam hati yang duka. Agar Almasih yang tulus, Bri perdamaian jiwa. Engkau, Tuhan berkuasa, Awal dan akhir iman, Buangkan dosa dari jiwa, Brikanlah kemenangan.
data.Ayat3: Engkaulah yang berkuasa, Melepaskan umat-Mu. Curahkan rahmat berlimpah, Kuduskanlah umat-Mu. Pada-Mu kami berbakti, Oleh kemurahan-Mu. Kami pun tiada berhenti, Memuliakan Nama-Mu.
data.Ayat4: Jadikan kami baharu, Sempurna dalam Yesus, Slamatlah oleh kasih-Mu, Dari mati dan dosa. Kami klak tiba di surga, Dalam negri yang mulia, Kami klak trima mahkota, Dan pandang muka Yesus.

data.Search: 21*Take Time To Be Holy*George C Stebbins W D Longstaff*Take time to be holy Speak oft with thy Lord Abide in Him always And feed on His Word Make friends of God’s children Help those who are weak Forgetting in nothing His blessing to seek*Take time to be holy The world rushes on Spend much time in secret With Jesus alone By looking to Jesus like Him thou shalt be Thy friends in thy conduct His likeness shall see*Take time to be holy let Him be thy Guide And run not before Him Whatever betide In joy or in sorrow Still follow the Lord And looking to Jesus still trust in His Word*Take time to be holy be calm in thy soul Each thought and each motive Beneath His control Thus led by His Spirit To fountains of love Thou soon shalt be fitted For service above
data.Pengubah: George C. Stebbins, W. D. Longstaff
data.Ayat1: Take time to be holy, Speak oft with thy Lord; Abide in Him always, And feed on His Word; Make friends of God’s children, Help those who are weak, Forgetting in nothing His blessing to seek.
data.Ayat2: Take time to be holy, The world rushes on; Spend much time in secret, With Jesus alone; By looking to Jesus, like Him thou shalt be; Thy friends in thy conduct His likeness shall see.
data.Ayat3: Take time to be holy, let Him be thy Guide, And run not before Him, Whatever betide; In joy or in sorrow, Still follow the Lord, And, looking to Jesus, still trust in His Word.
data.Ayat4: Take time to be holy, be calm in thy soul, Each thought and each motive Beneath His control; Thus led by His Spirit To fountains of love, Thou soon shalt be fitted For service above.

data.Search: 22*Sucikan Hatimu*George C Stebbins W D Longstaff*Sucikan hatimu Di dalam doa Carilah Tuhanmu Dalam sabda-Nya Tunjukkanlah cinta Tolong yang lemah Minta berkat Yesus Dalam hidupmu*Sucikan hatimu Slagi di dunia Gunakan waktumu bersama Yesus Pandanglah pada-Nya Tiru kasih-Nya Buangkan sgala dosa Cari rahmat-Nya*Sucikan hatimu Oleh kuasa-Nya Yesus Pemimpinmu Di mana-mana Meski dalam duka Dan kesusahan Turut selamanya Jalannya Tuhan*Sucikan hatimu Badan dan jiwa Tundukan dirimu Pada sabda-Nya Roh-Nya yang menuntun Pada kasih-Nya Dan pasti engkau pun Tiba di surga
data.Pengubah: George C. Stebbins, W. D. Longstaff
data.Ayat1: Sucikan hatimu Di dalam doa, Carilah Tuhanmu, Dalam sabda-Nya, Tunjukkanlah cinta, Tolong yang lemah, Minta berkat Yesus; Dalam hidupmu.
data.Ayat2: Sucikan hatimu Slagi di dunia, Gunakan waktumu, bersama Yesus, Pandanglah pada-Nya, Tiru kasih-Nya, Buangkan sgala dosa, Cari rahmat-Nya.
data.Ayat3: Sucikan hatimu Oleh kuasa-Nya, Yesus Pemimpinmu, Di mana-mana; Meski dalam duka, Dan kesusahan, Turut selamanya, Jalannya Tuhan.
data.Ayat4: Sucikan hatimu Badan dan jiwa, Tundukan dirimu, Pada sabda-Nya; Roh-Nya yang menuntun, Pada kasih-Nya, Dan pasti engkau pun, Tiba di surga.

data.Search: 23*Live Out Thy Life Within Me*Samuel Wesley Frances Ridley Havergal*Live out Thy life within me O Jesus King of kings! Be Thou Thyself the answer to all my questionings Live out Thy life within me in all things have Thy way! I the transparent medium Thy glory to display*The temple has been yielded And purified of sin Let Thy Shekinah glory Now shine forth from within And all the earth keep silence The body henceforth be Thy silent gentle servant Moved only as by Thee*Its members every moment held subject to Thy call Ready to have Thee use them Or not be used at all Held without restless longing Or strain or stress or fret Or chafings at Thy dealings Or thoughts of vain regret*But restful calm and pliant From bend and bias free Awaiting Thy decision when Thou hast need of me Live out Thy life within me O Jesus King of kings Be Thou the glorious answer To all my questionings
data.Judul: Live Out Thy Life Within Me
data.Ayat1: Live out Thy life within me, O Jesus, King of kings! Be Thou Thyself the answer to all my questionings; Live out Thy life within me, in all things have Thy way! I, the transparent medium Thy glory to display.
data.Ayat2: The temple has been yielded, And purified of sin; Let Thy Shekinah glory Now shine forth from within, And all the earth keep silence, The body henceforth be Thy silent, gentle servant, Moved only as by Thee,
data.Ayat3: Its members every moment held subject to Thy call, Ready to have Thee use them, Or not be used at all; Held without restless longing, Or strain, or stress, or fret, Or chafings at Thy dealings, Or thoughts of vain regret;
data.Ayat4: But restful, calm and pliant, From bend and bias free, Awaiting Thy decision, when Thou hast need of me. Live out Thy life within me, O Jesus, King of kings! Be Thou the glorious answer To all my questionings.

data.Search: 24*Hiduplah Dalam Aku*Samuel Wesley Frances Ridley Havergal*Hiduplah dalam aku Ya Yesus Rajaku Aku bawa pada-Mu Sgala perkaraku Hiduplah dalam aku Turut kehendakMu Agar kemuliaan-Mu Nyata dalam aku*Hatiku aku srahkan Bebas dari dosa Hadirat-Mu nyatakan Dalam aku Yesus Mulai skarang Ya Tuhan Pada-Mu ku bersrah Dunia aku tinggalkan Agar dapat surga*Diriku aku s’rahkan Turut kehendak-Mu Sedia melakukan Sgala perintah-Mu Aku takkan melawan Ataupun mengeluh Karna Engkau hentarkan Di dalam kasih-Mu*Tenang aku menunggu Panggilan-Mu Tuhan Kemana engkau suruh Ke sana ku jalan Hiduplah dalam aku Ya Yesus Rajaku Dan biar kehendak-Mu Jadi dalam aku
data.Ayat1: Hiduplah dalam aku, Ya Yesus Rajaku, Aku bawa pada-Mu, Sgala perkaraku; Hiduplah dalam aku, Turut kehendakMu, Agar kemuliaan-Mu Nyata dalam aku.
data.Ayat2: Hatiku aku srahkan, Bebas dari dosa, Hadirat-Mu nyatakan Dalam aku, Yesus; Mulai skarang, Ya Tuhan Pada-Mu ku bersrah, Dunia aku tinggalkan, Agar dapat surga.
data.Ayat3: Diriku aku s’rahkan Turut kehendak-Mu, Sedia melakukan Sgala perintah-Mu; Aku takkan melawan, Ataupun mengeluh, Karna Engkau hentarkan Di dalam kasih-Mu.
data.Ayat4: Tenang aku menunggu Panggilan-Mu Tuhan, Kemana engkau suruh, Ke sana ku jalan; Hiduplah dalam aku, Ya Yesus, Rajaku, Dan biar kehendak-Mu Jadi dalam aku.

data.Search: 25*I Am Coming to the Cross*William G Fischer William McDonald*I am coming to the cross I am poor and weak and blind I am counting all but dross I shall full salvation find*Long my heart has sighed for Thee Long as evil reigned within Jesus sweetly speaks to me I will cleanse you from all sin*Here I give my all to Thee Friends and time and earthly store Soul and body Thine to be Wholly Thine forevermore*Jesus comes He fills my soul I am every whitmade whole Glory glory to the Lamb*I am trusting Lord in Thee O Thou Lamb of Calvary Humbly at thy cross I bow Save me Jesus save me now
data.Judul: I Am Coming to the Cross
data.Ayat1: I am coming to the cross; I am poor, and weak, and blind; I am counting all but dross; I shall full salvation find.
data.Ayat2: Long my heart has sighed for Thee; Long as evil reigned within; Jesus sweetly speaks to me, I will cleanse you from all sin.
data.Ayat3: Here I give my all to Thee- Friends, and time, and earthly store; Soul and body Thine to be, Wholly Thine forevermore.
data.Ayat4: Jesus comes! He fills my soul! I am every whitmade whole- Glory, glory to the Lamb!
data.Ref: I am trusting, Lord, in Thee, O Thou Lamb of Calvary; Humbly at thy cross I bow; Save me, Jesus, save me now.

data.Search: 26*Aku Datang ke Salib*William G Fischer William McDonald*Aku datang kesalib Miskin buta dan lemah Nafsu dunia ku wajib Buang untuk anug’rah*Hendak dapat Rahmat-Nya Lama hatiku rindu Dengar Yesus bersabda aku hapus dosamu*Aku srahkan pada-Mu Harta dunia yang fana Segnap jiwa dan tubuh Pada-Mu ku serah*Yesus isi jiwaku Penuh dengan kuasa-Nya Dan sucilah hatiku Pujilah anak Domba*Aku harap pada-Mu Ya Domba di Golgota Dengarlah seruanku Tolong aku ya Yesus
data.Ayat1: Aku datang kesalib, Miskin, buta dan lemah; Nafsu dunia ku wajib, Buang untuk anug’rah.
data.Ayat2: Hendak dapat Rahmat-Nya, Lama hatiku rindu; Dengar Yesus bersabda, aku hapus dosamu!
data.Ayat3: Aku srahkan pada-Mu, Harta dunia yang fana; Segnap jiwa dan tubuh, Pada-Mu ku serah.
data.Ayat4: Yesus isi jiwaku, Penuh dengan kuasa-Nya; Dan sucilah hatiku, Pujilah anak Domba.
data.Ref: Aku harap pada-Mu, Ya Domba di Golgota, Dengarlah seruanku, Tolong aku, ya Yesus;

data.Search: 27*Near the Cross*William H Doane Fanny J Crosby*Jesus keep me near the cross There a precious fountain Free to all a healing stream Flows from Calvary's mountain*Near the cross a trembling soul Love and mercy found me There the bright and Morning Star Shed His beams around me*Near the cross O Lamb of God Bring its scenes before me Help me walk from day to day With its shadow o'er me*Near the cross I'll watch and wait Hoping trusting ever Till I reach the golden strand Just beyond the river*In the cross in the cross Be my glory ever Till my raptured soul shall find Rest beyond the river
data.Pengubah: William H. Doane, Fanny J. Crosby
data.Ayat1: Jesus, keep me near the cross; There a precious fountain, Free to all, a healing stream, Flows from Calvary's mountain.
data.Ayat2: Near the cross, a trembling soul, Love and mercy found me; There the bright and Morning Star Shed His beams around me.
data.Ayat3: Near the cross! O Lamb of God, Bring its scenes before me; Help me walk from day to day, With its shadow o'er me.
data.Ayat4: Near the cross I'll watch and wait, Hoping, trusting ever, Till I reach the golden strand, Just beyond the river.
data.Ref: In the cross, in the cross, Be my glory ever, Till my raptured soul shall find Rest beyond the river.

data.Search: 28*Tarik Aku Ya Yesus*William H Doane Fanny J Crosby*Tarik aku ya Yesus Dekat ke salib-Mu Air hidup Golgota Alirkan padaku*Dekat salib-Mu Yesus Ku dapat rahmat-Mu Cahaya dari sana Menerangi aku*Di salib Domba Allah Ku ingat kasih-Mu Pimpin aku ya Yesus Sepanjang umurku*Di salib aku tunggu Harap dan percaya Sambil aku menuju Ke surga yang baka*Di salib di salib Itu kemuliaan Hingga di sebrang sungai Dapat perhentian
data.Pengubah: William H. Doane, Fanny J. Crosby
data.Ayat1: Tarik aku, ya Yesus, Dekat ke salib-Mu, Air hidup Golgota, Alirkan padaku.
data.Ayat2: Dekat salib-Mu, Yesus, Ku dapat rahmat-Mu, Cahaya dari sana, Menerangi aku.
data.Ayat3: Di salib Domba Allah, Ku ingat kasih-Mu, Pimpin aku, ya Yesus, Sepanjang umurku.
data.Ayat4: Di salib aku tunggu, Harap dan percaya, Sambil aku menuju, Ke surga yang baka.
data.Ref: Di salib, di salib, Itu kemuliaan, Hingga di sebrang sungai, Dapat perhentian

data.Search: 29*Softly and Tenderly*Will L Thompson*Softly and tenderly Jesus is calling Calling for you and for me At the heart's portals He's waiting and watching Watching for you and for me*Why should we tarry when Jesus is pleading Pleading for you and for me Why should we linger and heed not His mercies Mercies for you and for me*Time is now fleeting the moments are passing Passing from you and from me Shadows are gathering and death's night is coming Coming for you and for me*Think of the wonderful love He has promised Promised for you and for me Though we have sinned He has mercy and pardon Pardon for you and for me*Come home come home Ye who are weary come home Earnestly tenderly Jesus is calling Calling O sinner come home
data.Ayat1: Softly and tenderly Jesus is calling, Calling for you and for me; At the heart's portals He's waiting and watching, Watching for you and for me.
data.Ayat2: Why should we tarry when Jesus is pleading, Pleading for you and for me? Why should we linger and heed not His mercies, Mercies for you and for me?
data.Ayat3: Time is now fleeting, the moments are passing, Passing from you and from me; Shadows are gathering and death's night is coming, Coming for you and for me.
data.Ayat4: Think of the wonderful love He has promised, Promised for you and for me; Though we have sinned, He has mercy and pardon, Pardon for you and for me.
data.Ref: Come home, come home, Ye who are weary come home; Earnestly, tenderly, Jesus is calling, Calling, O sinner, come home!

data.Search: 30*Manis Lembut Tuhan Yesus Memanggi*Will L Thompson*Manis lembut Tuhan Yesus memanggil Memanggil kau dan aku Yesus t'lah menunggu di pintu hati Menunggu kau dan aku*Jangan ragu bila Tuhan mengajak Mengajak kau dan aku Janganlah lambat terima kasih-Nya Bagi engkau dan aku*Waktu serta kesempatan berlalu Dari engkau dan aku Bagi kematian mengancam hidup Mengancam kau dan aku*Yesus berjanji membrikan kasih-Nya Kepada kau dan aku Di ampunkan orang yang berdosa Seperti kau dan aku*Hai datanglah Mari yang lelah pulang Manis lembut Tuhan Yesus memanggi Orang berdosa pulang
data.Ayat1: Manis lembut Tuhan Yesus memanggil, Memanggil kau dan aku; Yesus t'lah menunggu di pintu hati, Menunggu kau dan aku.
data.Ayat2: Jangan ragu bila Tuhan mengajak, Mengajak kau dan aku; Janganlah lambat terima kasih-Nya, Bagi engkau dan aku.
data.Ayat3: Waktu serta kesempatan berlalu, Dari engkau dan aku; Bagi kematian mengancam hidup, Mengancam kau dan aku.
data.Ayat4: Yesus berjanji membrikan kasih-Nya, Kepada kau dan aku; Di ampunkan orang yang berdosa, Seperti kau dan aku.
data.Ref: Hai datanglah, Mari yang lelah pulang, Manis lembut Tuhan Yesus memanggi, Orang berdosa pulang.

data.Search: 31*Pass Me Not O Gentle Saviour*William H Doany Fanny J Crosby*Pass me not O gentle Savior Hear my humble cry While on Others Thou art calling Do not pass me by*Let me at thy throne of mercy Find a sweet relief Kneeling there in deep contrition Help my unbelief*Trusting only in Thy merit Would I seek The face Heal my wounded broken spirit Save me by Thy grace*Thou the spring of all my comfort More than life to me Whom have i on earth beside Theem Whom in Heav'n but Thee*Savior Savior Hear my humble cry While on others Thou art calling Do not pass me by
data.Judul: Pass Me Not, O Gentle Saviour
data.Pengubah: William H. Doany, Fanny J. Crosby
data.Ayat1: Pass me not, O gentle Savior, Hear my humble cry; While on Others Thou art calling, Do not pass me by.
data.Ayat2: Let me at thy throne of mercy Find a sweet relief; Kneeling there in deep contrition, Help my unbelief.
data.Ayat3: Trusting only in Thy merit, Would I seek The face; Heal my wounded, broken spirit, Save me by Thy grace.
data.Ayat4: Thou the spring of all my comfort, More than life to me, Whom have i on earth beside Theem, Whom in Heav'n but Thee.
data.Ref: Savior, Savior, Hear my humble cry, While on others Thou art calling, Do not pass me by.

data.Search: 32*Jangan Lewatkan Aku*William H Doany Fanny J Crosby*Janganlah lewatkan aku Ya Penebusku Dengarkanlah seruanku Jaganlah lalu*Biarkan aku menghadap Hampir takhtaMu Disanalah aku harap Dapat berkatMu*Biarkan aku menghadap Hampir takhtaMu Disanalah aku harap Dapat berkatMu*Hanya dalam iman teguh Kucari Engkau Pilu dan duka hatiku Sembuhkan ya Hu*Engkau Yesus Penghiburku Yang lebih indah Daripada sesuatu Di dalam dunia*Yesus Yesus dengar seruku Waktu menjemput umat-Mu Ingatlah aku*
data.Pengubah: William H. Doany, Fanny J. Crosby
data.Ayat1: Janganlah lewatkan aku, Ya Penebusku! Dengarkanlah seruanku, Jaganlah lalu.
data.Ayat2: Biarkan aku menghadap, Hampir takhta-Mu; Disanalah aku harap, Dapat berkat-Mu.
data.Ayat3: Hanya dalam iman teguh, Kucari Engkau Pilu dan duka hatiku, Sembuhkan, ya Hu.
data.Ayat4: Engkau Yesus, Penghiburku, Yang lebih indah; Daripada sesuatu, Di dalam dunia.
data.Ref: Yesus, Yesus, dengar seruku! Waktu menjemput umat-Mu, Ingatlah aku!

data.Search: 33*I've Wandered Far Away From*William J Kirkpatrick*I've wandered far awat from God Now I'm coming home The paths of sin too long I've trod Lord I'm coming home*I've wasted many precious years Now I'm coming home I now repent with bitter tears Lord I'm coming home*I'm tired of sin and straying Lord Now I'm coming home I'll trust Thy love beleive Thy Word Lord I'm coming home*My only hope my only plea Now I'm coming home That Jesus died and died for me Lord I'm coming home*I need His cleansing blood I know Now I'm coming home O wash me whiter than the snow Lord I'm coming home*Coming home coming home Nevermore to roam Open wide Thine arms of love Lord I'm coming home
data.Ayat1: I've wandered far awat from God, Now I'm coming home; The paths of sin too long I've trod, Lord, I'm coming home.
data.Ayat2: I've wasted many precious years, Now I'm coming home; I now repent with bitter tears, Lord, I'm coming home.
data.Ayat3: I'm tired of sin and straying, Lord, Now I'm coming home; I'll trust Thy love, beleive Thy Word, Lord, I'm coming home.
data.Ayat4: My only hope, my only plea, Now I'm coming home; That Jesus died, and died for me. Lord, I'm coming home.
data.Ayat5: I need His cleansing blood, I know, Now I'm coming home; O wash me whiter than the snow, Lord, I'm coming home.
data.Ref: Coming home, coming home, Nevermore to roam, Open wide Thine arms of love, Lord, I'm coming home

data.Search: 34*Aku Sesat Dari Tuhan*William J. Kirkpatrick*Aku Sesat dari Tuhan S'karang Ku pulang Lama ku buat kejahatan S'karang ku pulang*Aku sudah lama hilang S'karang Ku pulang Aku bertobat Ya Tuhan S'karang Ku pulang*Aku tak mau sesat lagi S'karang Ku pulang KasihMu panggil kembali S'karang Ku pulang*Aku tak mau sesat lagi S'karang Ku pulang KasihMu panggil kembali S'karang Ku pulang*Oh dengarlah seruanku S'karang Ku pulang Engkau t'lah mati gantiku S'karang Ku pulang*DarahMu s'lamatkan aku S'karang Ku pulang Basuhkan s'gala dosaku S'karang Ku pulang*Ku pulang ke rumah Takkan menyimpang Ya Tuhanku t'rimalah S'karang Ku pulang*
data.Ayat1: Aku Sesat dari Tuhan, S'karang Ku pulang, Lama ku buat kejahatan, S'karang ku pulang.
data.Ayat2: Aku sudah lama hilang, S'karang Ku pulang, Aku bertobat, Ya Tuhan, S'karang Ku pulang.
data.Ayat3: Aku tak mau sesat lagi, S'karang Ku pulang, Kasih-Mu panggil kembali, S'karang Ku pulang.
data.Ayat4: Oh, dengarlah seruanku, S'karang Ku pulang, Engkau t'lah mati gantiku, S'karang Ku pulang.
data.Ayat5: Darah-Mu s'lamatkan aku, S'karang Ku pulang, Basuhkan s'gala dosaku, S'karang Ku pulang.
data.Ref: Ku pulang ke rumah, Takkan menyimpang, Ya Tuhanku, t'rimalah, S'karang Ku pulang.

data.Search: 35*Only Trust Him*J H Stockton*Come every soul by sin oppressed There's mercy with the Lord And he will surely give your rest By trusting in his word*For Jesus shed his precious blood Rich blessings to bestow Plunge now into crimson flood That washes bright as snow*Yes Jesus is the truth the way That leads you into rest Beleive in him without delay And you are fully blest*Come then and join this holy band And on to glory go To dwell in that celestial land Where joys immortal flow*Only trust him only trust him Only trust him now; He will save you he will save you He will save you now
data.Ayat1: Come, every soul by sin oppressed, There's mercy with the Lord; And he will surely give your rest, By trusting in his word.
data.Ayat2: For Jesus shed his precious blood Rich blessings to bestow; Plunge now into crimson flood That washes bright as snow.
data.Ayat3: Yes, Jesus is the truth the way That leads you into rest; Beleive in him without delay, And you are fully blest.
data.Ayat4: Come then and join this holy band, And on to glory go, To dwell in that celestial land Where joys immortal flow.
data.Ref: Only trust him, only trust him, Only trust him now; He will save you, he will save you, He will save you now.

data.Search: 36*Marilah Orang Berdosa*J H Stockton*Marilah orang berdosa Cari rahmat Tuhan Jikalau engkau percaya Engkau dis'lamatkan*Darah Yesus tertumpahlah Agar kita s'lamat Marilah kepada Yesus Dan t'rimalah berkat*Ya Yesuslah Kebenaran Dan jalan ke surga Percayalah pada Tuhan Dan s'lamat t'rimalah*Mari ikut umat suci Berjalan ke surga Di sana kita memuji Bersuka s'lamanya*Percayalah pada Yesus Percayalah s'karang Tuhan Yesus mau s'lamatkan S'lamatkan s'karang
data.Ayat1: Marilah, orang berdosa, Cari rahmat Tuhan; Jikalau engkau percaya, Engkau dis'lamatkan.
data.Ayat2: Darah Yesus, tertumpahlah, Agar kita s'lamat; Marilah kepada Yesus, Dan t'rimalah berkat.
data.Ayat3: Ya Yesuslah Kebenaran, Dan jalan ke surga; Percayalah pada Tuhan, Dan s'lamat t'rimalah.
data.Ayat4: Mari ikut umat suci, Berjalan ke surga; Di sana kita memuji, Bersuka s'lamanya.
data.Ref: Percayalah pada Yesus Percayalah s'karang, Tuhan Yesus mau s'lamatkan, S'lamatkan s'karang.

data.Search: 37*Nearer My God, to Thee*Lowell Mason Sarah F Adams*Nearer my God to Thee nearer to Thee E'en though it be a cross that raiseth me Still all my song shall be Nearer my God to Thee Nearer my God to Thee nearer to Thee*Though like a wanderer day light all gone Darkness be over me my rest a stone Yet in my dreams I'd be Nearer my God to Thee Nearer my God to Thee nearer to Thee*There let the way appear Steps up to heaven All that thou sendest me in mercy given Angels to beckbone me Nearer my God to Thee Nearer my God to Thee nearer to Thee*Then with my walking thoughts Bright with Thy praise Out of my stony griefs bethel I'll raise So by my woes to be Nearer my God to Thee Nearer my God to Thee Nearer to Thee*Or if on joyful wing cleaving the sky Sun moon and stars forgot upward I fly Still all my song shall be Nearer my Go to Thee Nearer my God to Thee nearer to Thee
data.Ayat1: Nearer my God, to Thee, nearer to Thee! E'en though it be a cross, that raiseth me! Still all my song shall be, Nearer my GOd to Thee, Nearer my God, to Thee, nearer to Thee!
data.Ayat2: Though like a wanderer, day light all gone, Darkness be over me, my rest a stone; Yet in my dreams I'd be, Nearer my God to Thee, Nearer my God, to Thee, nearer to Thee!
data.Ayat3: There let the way appear, Steps up to heaven, All that thou sendest me, in mercy given; Angels to beckbone me, Nearer my God to Thee, Nearer my God, to Thee, nearer to Thee!
data.Ayat4: Then, with my walking thoughts, Bright with Thy praise, Out of my stony griefs, bethel I'll raise; So by my woes to be, Nearer my God to Thee, Nearer my God, to Thee, Nearer to Thee!
data.Ayat5: Or if, on joyful wing, cleaving the sky, Sun, moon, and stars forgot. upward I fly; Still all my song shall be, Nearer my Go to Thee, Nearer my God, to Thee, nearer to Thee!

data.Search: 38*Ya Allah Aku Mau*Lowell Mason Sarah F Adams*Ya Allah aku mau datang dekat Jikalau salibpun ku mau angkat Inilah doaku hampir kepada-Mu Hampir kepadaMu Ya Allahku*Dan s'perti hal Yakub sudahlah g'lap Aku berbaring di tempat senyap Di dalam mimpiku ampir kepadaMu Hampir kepadaMu Ya Allahku*Nyatalah jalanku s'perti tangga Di mana malaikat naik ke surga Dipanggilnya aku hampir kepadaMu Hampir kepadaMu Ya Allahku*S'karang aku nbangun serta ingat Di sini Tuhanpun ada dekat Inilah Baiteku hampir kepadaMu Hampir kepadaMu Ya Allahku*Dan bila aku k'lak naik ke surga Akan ku nyanyikan dengan suka Perkataan itu hampir kepadaMu Hampir kepadaMu Ya Allahku
data.Ayat1: Ya Allah aku mau datang dekat, Jikalau salibpun ku mau angkat; Inilah doaku, hampir kepada-Mu, Hampir kepada-Mu, Ya Allahku.
data.Ayat2: Dan s'perti hal Yakub, sudahlah g'lap, Aku berbaring di tempat senyap; Di dalam mimpiku, ampir kepada-Mu, Hampir kepada-Mu, Ya Allahku.
data.Ayat3: Nyatalah jalanku s'perti tangga, Di mana malaikat naik ke surga; Dipanggilnya aku, hampir kepada-Mu, Hampir kepada-Mu, Ya Allahku.
data.Ayat4: S'karang aku nbangun serta ingat, Di sini Tuhanpun ada dekat, Inilah Baiteku, hampir kepada-Mu, Hampir kepada-Mu, Ya Allahku.
data.Ayat5: Dan bila aku k'lak naik ke surga, Akan ku nyanyikan dengan suka; Perkataan itu, hampir kepada-Mu, Hampir kepada-Mu, Ya Allahku.

data.Search: 39*All to Jesus I Surrender*W S Weeden J W VanDeVenter*All To Jesus I surrender All to him I freely give I will ever love and trust him In his presence daily live*All to Jesus I surrender Humbly at his feet I bow Wordly pleasures all forsaken Take me Jesus take me now*All to Jesus I surrender Make me Savior wholly thine Fill me with thy love and power Truly know that thou art mine*All to Jesus I surrender now I feel sacred flame O the joy full salvation! Glory glory to his name*I surrender all I surrender all All to thee my blessed Savior I surrender all
data.Pengubah: W. S. Weeden J. W. VanDeVenter
data.Ayat1: All To Jesus I surrender, All to him I freely give; I will ever love and trust him, In his presence daily live.
data.Ayat2: All to Jesus I surrender; Humbly at his feet I bow, Wordly pleasures all forsaken; Take me, Jesus, take me now.
data.Ayat3: All to Jesus I surrender; Make me, Savior, wholly thine; Fill me with thy love and power; Truly know that thou art mine.
data.Ayat4: All to Jesus I surrender; now I feel sacred flame. O the joy full salvation! Glory, glory, to his name!
data.Ref: I surrender all, I surrender all, All to thee, my blessed Savior, I surrender all.

data.Search: 40*Berserah Kepada Yesus*W S Weeden J W VanDeVenter*Berserah kepada Yesus Seg'nap badan dan hati Ialah yang aku sembah Harap dan mengasihi*Berserah Kepada Yesus AKu turut hendakMu Aku buangkan nafsu dunia oh Tuhan t'rima aku*Berserah kepada Yesus Aku jadi milik-Mu B'rikanlah padaku kuasa Sucikanlah hatiku*Berserah kepada Yesus Aku rasa kasih-Nya kar'na s'lamat yang dib'riNya Aku puji namaNya*Aku berserah aku berserah Pada Engkau Juruselamat Aku berserah
data.Pengubah: W. S. Weeden J. W. VanDeVenter
data.Ayat1: Berserah kepada Yesus, Seg'nap badan dan hati; Ia-lah yang aku sembah, Harap dan mengasihi.
data.Ayat2: Berserah Kepada Yesus, AKu turut hendak-Mu; Aku buangkan nafsu dunia, oh Tuhan t'rima aku.
data.Ayat3: Berserah kepada Yesus, Aku jadi milik-Mu; B'rikanlah padaku kuasa, Sucikanlah hatiku.
data.Ayat4: Berserah kepada Yesus, Aku rasa kasih-Nya; kar'na s'lamat yang dib'ri-Nya, Aku puji nama-Nya.
data.Ref: Aku berserah, aku berserah, Pada Engkau Juruselamat, Aku berserah.

data.Search: 41*Have Thine Own Way, Lord*Adelaide A. Pollard*Have thine own way, Lord! Have thine own way! Thou art the potter, I am the clay. Mold me and make me after thy will, while I am waiting, yielded and still.*Have thine own way, Lord! Have thine own way! Search me and try me, Savior today! Wash me just now, Lord, wash me just now, as in thy presence humbly I bow.*Have thine own way, Lord! Have thine own way! Wounded and weary, help me I pray! Power, all power, surely is thine! Touch me and heal me, Savior divine!*Have thine own way, Lord! Have thine own way! Hold o'er my being absolute sway. Fill with thy Spirit till all shall see Christ only, always, living in me!
data.Ayat1: Have thine own way, Lord! Have thine own way! Thou art the potter, I am the clay. Mold me and make me after thy will, while I am waiting, yielded and still.
data.Ayat2: Have thine own way, Lord! Have thine own way! Search me and try me, Savior today! Wash me just now, Lord, wash me just now, as in thy presence humbly I bow.
data.Ayat3: Have thine own way, Lord! Have thine own way! Wounded and weary, help me I pray! Power, all power, surely is thine! Touch me and heal me, Savior divine!
data.Ayat4: Have thine own way, Lord! Have thine own way! Hold o'er my being absolute sway. Fill with thy Spirit till all shall see Christ only, always, living in me!

data.Search: 42*Jadilah Tuhan Kehendakmu*Adelaide A. Pollard*Jadilah Tuhan, kehendak-Mu! Engkaulah Khalik, Aku debu Jadikan aku sesuka-Mu, Aku menunggu di kaki-Mu.*Jadilah Tuhan, kehendak-Mu! Ujilah skarang percayaku! Aku menyembah di kaki-Mu,Basuhkan aku sperti salju *Jadilah Tuhan, kehendak-Mu! Penatlah aku, Tolong, ya Hu! Kuasa sepenuh Di tangan-Mu, Jamahlah aku agar sembuh*Jadilah Tuhan, kehendak-Mu! Brikanlah aku, Iman teguh! Penuhi aku dengan Roh-Mu, Hiduplah Engkau Dalam aku !
data.Ayat1: Jadilah Tuhan, kehendak-Mu! Engkaulah Khalik, Aku debu Jadikan aku sesuka-Mu, Aku menunggu di kaki-Mu.
data.Ayat2: Jadilah Tuhan, kehendak-Mu! Ujilah skarang percayaku! Aku menyembah di kaki-Mu,Basuhkan aku sperti salju !
data.Ayat3: Jadilah Tuhan, kehendak-Mu! Penatlah aku, Tolong, ya Hu! Kuasa sepenuh Di tangan-Mu, Jamahlah aku agar sembuh !
data.Ayat4: Jadilah Tuhan, kehendak-Mu! Brikanlah aku, Iman teguh! Penuhi aku dengan Roh-Mu, Hiduplah Engkau Dalam aku !

data.Search: 43*Take The World, But Give Me Jesus*John R. Sweney, Fanny J. Crosby*Take the world, but give me Jesus, All its joys are but a name But His love abideth ever, Through eternal years the same.*Take the world, but give me Jesus, Sweetest comfort of my soul, With my Savior watching o’er me, I can sing though billows roll.*Take the world, but give me Jesus, Let me view His constant smile, Then throughout my pilgrim journey Light will cheer me all the while.*Oh, the height and depth of mercy! Oh, the length and breadth of love! Oh, the fullness of redemption, Pledge of endless life above!
data.Judul: Take The World, But Give Me Jesus
data.Pengubah: John R. Sweney, Fanny J. Crosby
data.Ayat1: Take the world, but give me Jesus, All its joys are but a name But His love abideth ever, Through eternal years the same.
data.Ayat2: Take the world, but give me Jesus, Sweetest comfort of my soul, With my Savior watching o’er me, I can sing though billows roll. [Refrain]
data.Ayat3: Take the world, but give me Jesus, Let me view His constant smile, Then throughout my pilgrim journey Light will cheer me all the while. [Refrain]
data.Ayat4: Take the world, but give me Jesus In His cross my trust shall be, Till, with clearer, brighter vision, Face to face my Lord I see. [Refrain]
data.Ref: Oh, the height and depth of mercy! Oh, the length and breadth of love! Oh, the fullness of redemption, Pledge of endless life above!

data.Search: 44*Buangkan Dunia, Trima Yesus*John R. Sweney, Fanny J. Crosby*Buangkan dunia t'rima Yesus, Fana seisi dunia, Tapi kekal kasih Yesus, Sampai s'lama-lamanya*Buangkan dunia t'rima Yesus, Penghiburan jiwaku Dalam perlindungan Yesus, Aku nyanyi selalu.*Buangkan dunia t'rima Yesus, Ku memandang senyum-Nya, T'rang kasih-Nya membimbingku, Di jalanku ke surga.*Oh, anug'rah tak terduga, Oh kasih tak disangkal Oh, tebusan yang sempurna, Karunia hidup kekal
data.Pengubah: John R. Sweney, Fanny J. Crosby
data.Ayat1: Buangkan dunia t'rima Yesus, Fana seisi dunia, Tapi kekal kasih Yesus, Sampai s'lama-lamanya
data.Ayat2: Buangkan dunia t'rima Yesus, Penghiburan jiwaku Dalam perlindungan Yesus, Aku nyanyi selalu.
data.Ayat3: Buangkan dunia t'rima Yesus, Ku memandang senyum-Nya, T'rang kasih-Nya membimbingku, Di jalanku ke surga.
data.Ayat4: Buangkan dunia, t'rima Yesus, Salib-Nya harapanku Ku k'lak memandang di surga, Wajah Yesus Tuhanku.
data.Ref: Oh, anug'rah tak terduga, Oh kasih tak disangkal Oh, tebusan yang sempurna, Karunia hidup kekal

data.Search: 45*The Saviour Is Waiting*Ralph Carmichael*The Saviour is waiting and calling, He bids us come in to the feast O come, all ye hungry and sad ones, There’s room for the worst and the least.*He spread all His bounties before them, He sought them where’er they might roam, With love trembling sweet in His message, He tenderly bade them come home.*Have you ever thought of His mercy? He graciously calls you today, The feast of His love still is waiting, O turn not, O turn not away.*Once they all made light of the story, And turned to their pleasure and sin, The proud and the careless despised Him, But the humble and poor entered in.
data.Ayat1: The Saviour is waiting and calling, He bids us come in to the feast O come, all ye hungry and sad ones, There’s room for the worst and the least.
data.Ayat2: He spread all His bounties before them, He sought them where’er they might roam, With love trembling sweet in His message, He tenderly bade them come home. [Refrain]
data.Ayat3: Have you ever thought of His mercy? He graciously calls you today, The feast of His love still is waiting, O turn not, O turn not away. [Refrain]
data.Ref: Once they all made light of the story, And turned to their pleasure and sin, The proud and the careless despised Him, But the humble and poor entered in.

data.Search: 46*Yesus Menantimu*Ralph Carmichael*Ralph Carmichael*Di pintu hatimu, Tuhan Menunggu, Dia panggil lembut merdu; Dengan sabar Dia menunggu di sana, Apakah jawabanmu*Saudara, apakah kerinduanmu, Ingin kau hidup kekal ? S'rahkanlah dirimu, kepada Yesus, Tak kan engkau menyesal*Lama nian Yesus nantikan kau, Dan masih tetap menunggu; Menantikan engkau membuka hati, oh, Yesus sangat rindu
data.Ayat1: Di pintu hatimu, Tuhan Menunggu, Dia panggil lembut merdu; Dengan sabar Dia menunggu di sana, Apakah jawabanmu ?
data.Ayat2: Saudara, apakah kerinduanmu, Ingin kau hidup kekal ? S'rahkanlah dirimu, kepada Yesus, Tak kan engkau menyesal
data.Ref: Lama nian Yesus nantikan kau, Dan masih tetap menunggu; Menantikan engkau membuka hati, oh, Yesus sangat rindu

data.Search: 47*I Have Decided to Follow Jesus*Norman Johnson, An Indian Prince*I have decided to follow Jesus; I have decided to follow Jesus; I have decided to follow Jesus; no turning back, no turning back.*Though none go with me, I still will follow; though none go with me, I still will follow; though none go with me, I still will follow; no turning back, no turning back.*The world behind me, the cross before me; the world behind me, the cross before me, the world behind me, the cross before me; no turning back, no turning back.
data.Judul: I Have Decided to Follow Jesus
data.Ayat1: I have decided to follow Jesus; I have decided to follow Jesus; I have decided to follow Jesus; no turning back, no turning back.
data.Ayat2: Though none go with me, I still will follow; though none go with me, I still will follow; though none go with me, I still will follow; no turning back, no turning back.
data.Ayat3: The world behind me, the cross before me; the world behind me, the cross before me, the world behind me, the cross before me; no turning back, no turning back.

data.Search: 48*Keputusanku Mengikut Yesus*Norman Johnson, An Indian Prince*Mengikut Yesus keputusanku, Mengikut Yesus keputusanku Mengikut Yesus keputusanku. ‘Ku tak ingkar, ‘Ku tak ingkar.*Walau sendiri ‘kuikut Yesus, Walau sendiri ‘kuikut Yesus, Walau sendiri ‘kuikut Yesus. ‘Ku tak ingkar, ‘Ku tak ingkar.*Dunia di b’lakang salib di depan, Dunia di b’lakang salib di depan, Dunia di b’lakang salib di depan. ‘Ku tak ingkar, ‘Ku tak ingkar.

data.Search: 49*Hai, S'kalian Orang*Issac Watts, Robert Lowry*Hai skalian orang yang mengasihi Tuhan, Hendaklah kamupun datang, Hendaklah kamupun datang, Menyanyi pujian, menyanyi pujian.*Masamlah mukanya yang blum kenal Tuhan, Yang ada Bapa di surga, Yang ada Bapa di surga, Bersuka-sukaan , bersuka-sukaan.*Seblum kami sampai negri Sion itu, Beribu padang yang permai, Beribu padang yang permai, Yang kami mau lalu, yang kami mau lalu.*Kami skalian tuju ke negri yang indah, Sapulah airmatamu, Sapulah airmatamu, Bersorak-soraklah, bersorak-soraklah.*Ke Sion ke Sion, Kami berjalan ke Sion, Ikut'lah kami ke Sion, Berjalan ke negri Allah
data.Ayat1: Hai skalian orang yang mengasihi Tuhan, Hendaklah kamupun datang, Hendaklah kamupun datang, Menyanyi pujian, menyanyi pujian.
data.Ayat2: Masamlah mukanya yang blum kenal Tuhan, Yang ada Bapa di surga, Yang ada Bapa di surga, Bersuka-sukaan , bersuka-sukaan.

data.Search: 50*Marching To Zion*Issac Watts, Robert Lowry*Come, we that love the Lord, and let our joys be known. Join in a song with sweet accord, join in a song with sweet accord, and thus surround the throne, and thus surround the throne.*The hill of Zion yields a thousand sacred sweets, before we reach the heav’nly fields, before we reach the heav’nly fields, or walk the golden streets, or walk the golden streets.*Then let our songs abound, and ev’ry tear be dry. We’re marching thro’ Immanuel’s ground, we’re marching thro’ Immanuel’s ground, to fairer worlds on high, to fairer worlds on high.*We’re marching to Zion, beautiful, beautiful Zion. We’re marching upward to Zion, the beautiful city of God.
data.Ayat1: Come, we that love the Lord, and let our joys be known. Join in a song with sweet accord, join in a song with sweet accord, and thus surround the throne, and thus surround the throne.
data.Ayat2: The hill of Zion yields a thousand sacred sweets, before we reach the heav’nly fields, before we reach the heav’nly fields, or walk the golden streets, or walk the golden streets. [Refrain]
data.Ayat3: Then let our songs abound, and ev’ry tear be dry. We’re marching thro’ Immanuel’s ground, we’re marching thro’ Immanuel’s ground, to fairer worlds on high, to fairer worlds on high. [Refrain]
data.Ref: We’re marching to Zion, beautiful, beautiful Zion. We’re marching upward to Zion, the beautiful city of God.
